genresAdvancedInfo.name: spanish jazz
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Spanish jazz is a genre of jazz music that incorporates elements of Spanish and Latin American music. It often features flamenco guitar, Latin percussion, and Spanish-language vocals. Artists like Paco de Luc√≠a, Chick Corea, and Michel Camilo have been instrumental in developing this style of jazz, which has gained popularity both in Spain and internationally. Spanish jazz is known for its passion, energy, and virtuosity.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
